message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $9000. I think it's a great deal considering its value to you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get closer to the value I think it's worth to me.

Hi Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $8250. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that $8000 is your maximum, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $8100. This is as low as I'm willing to go.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8000 and $8100, which would be $8050. I hope we can come to an agreement.
